# NSSecureTextFieldCell

**Class**

A text field whose value is hidden from the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSSecureTextFieldCell
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSecureTextFieldCell] works with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSecureTextField] and overrides the general cell use of the field editor to provide its own field editor, which doesn’t display text or allow the user to cut or copy its value.

## Working with character echo

- **echosBullets**: A Boolean that indicates whether the receiver echoes a bullet character rather than each character typed.

## Cell

- **NSTextFieldCell**: An object that enhances the text display capabilities of a cell.

## Inherits From

- NSTextFieldCell

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSAccessibilityElementProtocol
- NSAccessibilityProtocol
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSUserInterfaceItemIdentification
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
